item.title: Hiddenadmin
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“givehidden”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kyle”)) {
String name = command.substring(11);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 4;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }[/code]

This should work I fixed to minor errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Hiddenadmin
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

} else if (command.startsWith("givehidden") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kyle")) {
            String name = command.substring(11);

            try {
                int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

                c.playerRights = 4;
                c.savemoreinfo();
                c.savechar();
                c.disconnected = true;
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sm(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
            }

You messed up a very easy part at the beginning of your code, try it now.
